titleStmt.title: Digital Edition of Glaser Abklatsch ID: AT-OeAW-BA-3-27-A-GL1572
AT-OeAW-BA-3-27-A-GL1572

encodingDesc.p: The original encoding was done in plain text files following the encoding quidelines of the Morgenländische Gesellschaft. With a dedicated web application these plain text files were transformed into XML documents validating (partially) against the Epidoc-Schema and those XML-Documents have been further sematically annotaded.
In order to avoid well known xml-issues especially in regards of overlapping elements the actual edited/annotated text was multiplied in several anonymos blocks, each block providing specific markup.

div.tei:ab: 1.[w-hmẓʾ | w-ṣdq | ʾlšrḥ | w-b=] 2.[n-hw | bnw | yḥmn | ʾṣrḥn | l-ʾlm=] 3.[qh | bʿl | ʾwʿln | kl | mlʾ | w-rbḥ | sm=] 4.[ʿm | ḏ-ʿmdm | smʿ | sʾl | ʾlmqhw | bny | y=] 5.[ḥmn | smʿ | b-hw | tʿlm | ḥywn | bn | yḥmn] 6.[ṣrwḥyn | smʿ | ybln | k-ʾbd | bn | ẓbyn] 7.[ʾlmqh | w-ḏn-m | wtfn | mṣdqm | l-bny | y=] 8.[ḥmn | bn | hwt | smʿn | ʾhnn | ʿkr | w-l | yyf=] 9.[ʿn | w-kwn | ḏn | wtfn | w-mṣdqn | b-ḏ | nswr] 10.[qdmn | gyl | ḫrf | yqhmlk | bn | ʾb=] 11.[ʿm | kbr | ḫll]

w-hmẓʾ w-ṣdq ʾlšrḥ w-b=
n-hw bnw yḥmn ʾṣrḥn l-ʾlm=
qh bʿl ʾwʿln kl mlʾ w-rbḥ sm=
ʿm ḏ-ʿmdm smʿ sʾl ʾlmqhw bny y=
ḥmn smʿ b-hw tʿlm ḥywn bn yḥmn
ṣrwḥyn smʿ ybln k-ʾbd bn ẓbyn
ʾlmqh w-ḏn-m wtfn mṣdqm l-bny y=
ḥmn bn hwt smʿn ʾhnn ʿkr w-l yyf=
ʿn w-kwn ḏn wtfn w-mṣdqn b-ḏ nswr
qdmn gyl ḫrf yqhmlk bn ʾb=
ʿm kbr ḫll

1.[ʾĪlsharaḥ and his son, of the lineage of Yaḥmān, the Ṣirwāḥites, have paid over] 2.[to, and bestowed upon, ʾĪlmu-] 3.[quh, Lord of the Ibexes, all of the total amount of income and the profit of the] 4.[valid document, (namely) the document which ʾĪlmuquhū had demanded of the lineage of Ya-] 5.[ḥmān, the document which Ḥaywān of the lineage of Yaḥmān, the Ṣirwāḥī, had authenticated,] 6.[the document which prescribes taxes forever from Ẓabiyyān to] 7.[ʾĪlmuquh. Now this very grant is written proof for the lineage of Ya-] 8.[ḥmān of that document, if ever it (i.e. the document) is contested, and let it then be pub-] 9.[licized. And this written proof was (drawn up) in (the month of) Dhū-Nasūr,] 10.[the initial part of the (eponymous) year of Yiqahmalik bin ʾAbī-] 11.[ʿamm of Kabīr-Khalīl.]

tei:ab.tei:supplied: ʾĪlsharaḥ and his son, of the lineage of Yaḥmān, the Ṣirwāḥites, have paid over
to, and bestowed upon, ʾĪlmu-
quh, Lord of the Ibexes, all of the total amount of income and the profit of the
valid document, namely the document which ʾĪlmuquhū had demanded of the lineage of Ya-
ḥmān, the document which Ḥaywān of the lineage of Yaḥmān, the Ṣirwāḥī, had authenticated,
the document which prescribes taxes forever from Ẓabiyyān to
ʾĪlmuquh. Now this very grant is written proof for the lineage of Ya-
ḥmān of that document, if ever it i.e. the document is contested, and let it then be pub-
licized. And this written proof was drawn up in the month of Dhū-Nasūr,
the initial part of the eponymous year of Yiqahmalik bin ʾAbī-
ʿamm of Kabīr-Khalīl.

div.tei:ab:
ʾĪlsharaḥ and his son, of the lineage of Yaḥmān, the Ṣirwāḥites, have paid over
to, and bestowed upon, ʾĪlmu-
quh, Lord of the Ibexes, all of the total amount of income and the profit of the
valid document, namely the document which ʾĪlmuquhū had demanded of the lineage of Ya-
ḥmān, the document which Ḥaywān of the lineage of Yaḥmān, the Ṣirwāḥī, had authenticated,
the document which prescribes taxes forever from Ẓabiyyān to
ʾĪlmuquh. Now this very grant is written proof for the lineage of Ya-
ḥmān of that document, if ever it i.e. the document is contested, and let it then be pub-
licized. And this written proof was drawn up in the month of Dhū-Nasūr,
the initial part of the eponymous year of Yiqahmalik bin ʾAbī-
ʿamm of Kabīr-Khalīl.

ʾĪlsharaḥ and his son, of the lineage of Yaḥmān, the Ṣirwāḥites, have paid over
to, and bestowed upon, ʾĪlmu-
quh, Lord of the Ibexes, all of the total amount of income and the profit of the
valid document, namely the document which ʾĪlmuquhū had demanded of the lineage of Ya-
ḥmān, the document which Ḥaywān of the lineage of Yaḥmān, the Ṣirwāḥī, had authenticated,
the document which prescribes taxes forever from Ẓabiyyān to
ʾĪlmuquh. Now this very grant is written proof for the lineage of Ya-
ḥmān of that document, if ever it i.e. the document is contested, and let it then be pub-
licized. And this written proof was drawn up in the month of Dhū-Nasūr,
the initial part of the eponymous year of Yiqahmalik bin ʾAbī-
ʿamm of Kabīr-Khalīl.
